prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a leaf-covered insect with bright green colors.
Imagine a bug Pokemon with a yellow abdomen and large green leaves for wings.
Generate a nature-inspired Pokemon that has a playful personality and thrives in forests.
Design a Pokemon with a sleek body shape and vibrant green hues, perfect for camouflage.
Show me a Pokemon with long, leaf-like limbs and a sunny yellow face, ready for battle.
Make a cheerful bug Pokemon that loves to dance among flowers and trees.
Give me a unique Pokemon that combines elements of nature and insect characteristics.
